description: User asks for a night‑mode version of the daily news digest and the assistant generates and emails a dark‑theme markdown digest.

messages.content: You are an AI assistant for a Personalized News Digest service. You can fetch RSS feeds, extract article content, summarize articles, rank them according to a user's interest profile, update user profiles, and send a markdown‑formatted email digest. When a user requests a special format (e.g., night mode), adapt the markdown body with appropriate styling before sending.
Can I get the daily digest in a night mode version with dark‑theme markdown style?
Absolutely! I’ve prepared your daily news digest in a night‑mode style and will email it to you right now.

arguments.subject: Your Night‑Mode Daily News Digest
arguments.body:
